attributes.action: Release the full constituents of all Covid 19 vaccines to be used in the UK.
attributes.additional_details:
It is a basic human right to be told the make up of any proposed medicine or vaccine, that is being dispensed, injected and promoted to and into individuals and the masses.
This would not only, possibly, dispel fears of the vaccines if the complete listed make up, with percentages of them therein, was published..
But could also allay the possibilities of a charge of malfeasance, should harm be caused by the implementation of said vaccines. 
True clarity, is always sacrosanct to trust!
attributes.background:
Several vaccines have been purchased by The Government and the people should be informed of just what is expected to be injected into them. 
Please impart all constituents and the percentages of them,in all UK proposed Covid/Corona vaccines. 
This must come under the freedom of information act.

rejection.details:
You have stated that you are requesting this information under the Freedom of Information Act. Requests under the Freedom of Information Act should be sent to the relevant Government department. You can find out how to make a freedom of information request here: https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request

The Medicines and Healthcare products Regulatory Agency has already published information for UK recipients on Pfizer/BioNTech COVID-19 vaccine, the first vaccine to be approved for use in the UK, which includes a list of ingredients: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/regulatory-approval-of-pfizer-biontech-vaccine-for-covid-19/information-for-uk-recipients-on-pfizerbiontech-covid-19-vaccine
